Articles.Content:
I oddly remember there being a mod that changed the sound of engines within KSP- aircraft and rocket engines alike... Like how Hotrocket's changes the exhaust- but this mod changed the sound to something more realistic and satisfying... am I dreaming that this imaginary mod once existed or did it? If so- is it compatible with 1.0.2? Or has it been updated for 1.0.2?

If this never existed- could someone make it? (but I seriously think this already exists (dead or alive))
I'm working on something that will let you use KWRocketry's engine sounds with stock engines.
Well I remember this being a standalone thing- working for several mods and stock as well.

Is this what you're thinking of?

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53800-RELEASED-A-R-P-mod-%28-Audio-Replacement-Project-%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53800-RELEASED-A-R-P-mod-%28-Audio-Replacement-Project-%29)

> 
> Is this what you're thinking of?
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53800-RELEASED-A-R-P-mod-%28-Audio-Replacement-Project-%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53800-RELEASED-A-R-P-mod-%28-Audio-Replacement-Project-%29)

No... and it had a fancy name like Hotrockets- I swear I'm not making this up!! I remember it being real!

I would like to see something like this as well. It would be really cool if the sound changed with the altitude/atmospheric density. Starting as a really loud roar at launch and gradually becoming a low rumble in the vacuum of space.

> 
> I would like to see something like this as well. It would be really cool if the sound changed with the altitude/atmospheric density. Starting as a really loud roar at launch and gradually becoming a low rumble in the vacuum of space.

^^^^ this.

> 
> I would like to see something like this as well. It would be really cool if the sound changed with the altitude/atmospheric density. Starting as a really loud roar at launch and gradually becoming a low rumble in the vacuum of space.

You're looking for [Atmospheric Sound Enhancement](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/56405).

It might also be Muffler: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50236-0-21-Audio-Muffler?](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50236-0-21-Audio-Muffler?)

It hasn't been updated since 0.21 but it should work in 1.0.2. Beware, though. It might be a bit broken.
